snippet: France's president toured the Paris museum on Wednesday following a $26 million government-funded renovation that tripled its size, making it one of largest contemporary art spaces in Europe.
abstract: France's president toured the Paris museum on Wednesday following a $26 million government-funded renovation that tripled its size, making it one of largest contemporary art spaces in Europe.

headline.main: Sarkozy Praises 'Magic' of the New Palais de Tokyo, Opening Thursday
